sourcesContent:
import { Card, CardHeader, CardBody, CardFooter, Box, Center, Button, Slider, SliderTrack, SliderFilledTrack, SliderThumb, Text } from '@chakra-ui/react'

export default function App() {
    const inicio = "0:00"
    const fin = "1:30"
    const duracion = 90

    return (
        <Box position="relative" p={30}>
            <Center>
                <Card w="100vw" h="20vh" borderRadius="35px" >
                    <CardBody >
                        <Center>
                            <Text fontSize='md'>{inicio}</Text>
                            <Slider w="80%" mh min={0} max={duracion} colorScheme='' defaultValue={0}>
                                <SliderTrack>
                                    <SliderFilledTrack />
                                </SliderTrack>
                                <SliderThumb />
                            </Slider>
                            <Text fontSize='md'>{fin}</Text>
                        </Center>
                    </CardBody>
                    <CardFooter>
                        <Button colorScheme="blue">Sign up</Button>
                    </CardFooter>
                </Card>
            </Center>
        </Box>
    );
}
